ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Tank question
ygData.msgSnippet: The one who I think can hold aggro better, unless the difference is huge. 200 HPs in BoT for example is completely trivial, so is 25 more ac...I m going to
ygData.messageBody:
The one who I think can hold aggro better, unless the difference is huge.
200 HPs in BoT for example is completely trivial, so is 25 more ac...I'm
going to make the call based on who's not going to bounce the mob around and
let our cleric or slower get mauled.
----- Original Message -----
From: STG2(SW) Pierce <piercer@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 24, 2004 4:34 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Tank question


> Hail all!
>
> I've got a question for you all..say your the group leader and you have 2
> tanks. You compare them to see who is going to be the Main Tank and one
> tank has more hit points than the other, but the other has more AC. Who
do
> you choose to be the Main Tank, the guy with more hit points, or AC?
>
> Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Caelitus> Ayonae Ro
> Shadowkight of the 54th Suffering
>
>
>
